item.title: Services
item.description: Providing one off or ongoing Cyber Security advisory services that offer expert guidance and strategic support to improve your company’s security posture.

item.title: Cyber Security Maturity Assessment
item.description: A Cyber Security assessment will allow us to measure your current maturity level.

item.title: Business Differentiator
item.description: A well-protected business is confident and innovative. Today, smart businesses not only manage cyber risks but turn them into opportunities for growth.

item.title: About
item.description: First - the company name. I wanted my company to have a unique name but I didn’t want to be another XYZ Security or ABC Cyber. I wanted the company’s name to be something unique and somewhat geeky. I was listening to the audiobooks for the Expanse sci-fi series. In the books, the characters “inherit” a Martian space craft that they decide to name “Rocinante”, which I later discovered came from the name of Don Quixote’s horse.

item.title: Contact
item.description: Reach out for a consultation or just to chat!
